badges.text:
You can only eat items made entirely out of fuel items. Torches and scaffolding are exempt as food items, as are tools like fishing rods and bows.
Fuel does not restore food unless you are not at full hunger. Fuel is always restored if you are missing any.
You can not interact with the world while holding a food item unless you sneak.
> Wooden items, paper, leaves, flowers, saplings, wool = 2 Melons. Restores 3 fuel.
> Coal, charcoal, blaze powder, gunpowder, campfires = 2 Cooked chickens. Restores 30 fuel.
> Coal block, blaze rod = 2 Golden carrots. Restores 180 fuel.

actions.command: execute at @s run particle minecraft:flash ^ ^ ^ 0 0 0 0 1 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:explosion ^ ^ ^ 4 0 4 0 50 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:flash ^ ^ ^ 0 0 0 0 1 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:explosion ^ ^ ^ 4 0 4 0 50 normal @a
title @s actionbar {"text": "[WARNING]: Explosion imminent, seek cooling!", "color": "red"}
execute as @e[tag=ordnance,distance=..5] run resource change @s ordnance:ordnance_passives_fuel 1
execute at @s run particle minecraft:small_flame ^-0.2 ^0 ^-0.2 1 -1.5 0.5 0.05 0 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:small_flame ^-0.2 ^0 ^1.4 1 -1.5 -0.5 0.05 0 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:small_flame ^0.2 ^0 ^1.4 -1 -1.5 -0.5 0.05 0 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:small_flame ^0.2 ^0 ^-0.2 -1 -1.5 -0.5 0.05 0 normal @a

action.command: execute as @e[tag=ordnance,distance=..5] run resource change @s ordnance:ordnance_passives_munitions 1
execute as @e[tag=ordnance,tag=upfriend] run resource change @s ordnance:ordnance_passives_munitions 1

actions.command: execute at @s run particle minecraft:campfire_cosy_smoke ^-0.5 ^ ^-0.5 0 0 0 0 1 normal @a
execute at @s run particle minecraft:campfire_cosy_smoke ^0.5 ^ ^-0.5 0 0 0 0 1 normal @a
execute positioned ~ ~0.2 ~ rotated as @s run particle minecraft:item minecraft:blaze_powder ^ ^1.86 ^0.2 0.1 0.1 0.1 0.055 4
execute at @s run particle minecraft:campfire_cosy_smoke ^ ^0 ^1.4 0 0 0 0.1 5 normal @a

name: Manufacture Munitions
description:
While grounded, you produce 4 munitions per second, and you generate half as much while flying. Munitions are used by your Piercing Stinger Cannon.
§f§nHeavy Model§r
Your maximum health is increased by 40%, your size is increased by 33%, and your walking speed is reduced by 33%.
§f§nDual Jet Engine§r
You are equipped with fuel-efficient self-propelled wings, which produce their own thrust as long as you have fuel. You will plummet down if you run out of fuel mid-flight.
§f§nResupply Formation§r
Ordnance players flying within 5 blocks of you have a chance to generate ammunition in the air and do not consume fuel.
§f§nEfficient Fuel Conversion§r
You can not eat normal food. Instead, you must consume items you can burn and gain fuel from. The amount of food/saturation and fuel you get depends on the item consumed. Sneaking prevents you from eating.
§f§nCredit Where It's Due§r
Enemies killed with your Piercing Stinger Cannons do not drop experience.
§f§nDevastation of War§r
Your Piercing Stinger Cannons can destroy items, making it harder for you to loot anything.
§f§nSlow Repairs§r
You regain health 66% more slowly.
§f§nLanding Strip§r
You gain a speed bonus when sprinting on rails.
§f§nGreater Powder Keg§r
If you take explosive or fire damage while your munitions are over 66% full, you will explode, dealing damage to yourself and other creatures around you. You can prevent this explosion if you get in water until your ammunition stabilizes or by drinking any potion or bottle of water.
